title: Zephyra
description: A royal fire elemental. The mysterious man she can't figure out. And a mad king with a dark plan.  Bullied as a child and never able to live up to her mother’s expectations, it’s no wonder Zephyra longs to leave her royal life at court behind. When she has to do just that in order to protect her cousin, the queen, she quickly finds out how dangerous life beyond the palace walls is. And there is more than one threat to the kingdom. After being thrown in harms way, Zephyra’s destiny becomes entangled with a mysterious stranger’s who harbours secrets of his own.  Can she learn to trust him and master the fire within her before their world is shrouded in darkness?  Perfect for fans of books like Throne of Glass and Queen of the Tearling.  Buy now to start the epic Elemental Diaries series today!  This book follows the life of the fire elemental as she grows from a child into a woman.  Please note: This is a second edition.
author: Andrea B. Lamoureux
